name: Cyclops
text: Optic Blast − Action (attack): Spend one resource of any type → deal 3 damage to an enemy with an upgrade attached. (Limit once per round).

name: Scott Summers
text: You may include [[X-MEN]] allies from any aspect in your deck. Constant Training − Action: Search your deck for a [[TACTIC]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round).

name: Phoenix
text: Response: After Phoenix enters play, choose a Cyclops card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Ruby Quartz Visor
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust this card → generate a [energy] resource for your "Optic Blast" ability. That attack gains piercing and ranged.

name: Field Commander
text: You take the first turn during player phase. (When your turn is done, play proceeds in player order, starting with the first player. You do not take another turn.) Each Cyclops upgrade attached to a minion loses the temporary keyword.

name: Exploit Weakness
text:
Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy.
Temporary.
Increase the amount of damage attached enemy takes from each attack by 1.

name: Practiced Defense
text:
Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy.
Temporary.
Attached enemy gets -1 ATK.

name: Priority Target
text: Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy. Temporary. Interrupt: When attached enemy is defeated, the player who defeated it draws 2 cards.

name: Full Blast
text: Hero Interrupt: When you use your "Optic Blast" ability, exhaust Cyclops → this attack deals 8 additionnal damage and gains overkill.

name: Rocket Beam
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 3 damage to an enemy with an upgrade attached.

name: Tactical Brillance
text: Hero Action (thwart): Dremove 3 threat from a scheme. Choose a [[TACTIC]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Beast
text: Response: After Beast enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a resource card and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Dust
text: [star] Interrupt: When Dust attacks a minion, she attacks each minion in play. Dust takes +1 consequential damage ([consequential]) after this attack.

name: Rockslide
text: Retaliate 1.

name: Blindfold
text: Response: After Blindfold enters play, look at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 1 of those cards and put the rest back in the same order.

name: Danger Room Training
text:
Attach to an [[X-MEN]] ally. Max 1 [[TRAINING]] upgrade per ally.
Attached ally gets +1 THW,  +1 ATK and +1 hot point.

name: Coordinated Attack
text:
Attach to an minion. Max 1 per minion.
Each ally takes -1 consequential damage ([consequential]) when attacking attached minion.

name: Effective Leadership
text: Max 2 per deck. Interrupt: When you spend this card to play an ally, that ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Angel
text: Reduce the cost to play Angel by 1 if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] or [[X-MEN]] trait.

name: Utopia
text: If each of your allies has the [[X-MEN]] trait, increase your ally limit by 1.

name: Danger Room
text: Alter-Ego Response: After an [[X-MEN]] ally enters play, exhaust Danger Room → search your deck and discard pile for a [[TRAINING]] upgrade and attach it to that ally. Any player whose alter-ego has the [[MUTANT]] trait may trigger this ability.

name: Game Time
text: Hero Action: Choose an ally with a [[TRAINING]] upgrade attached → ready that ally and heal 1 damage from it.

name: Psychic Rapport
text: Team-Up (Cyclops and Phoenix). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Ready Cyclops and Phoenix. Choose to either return a Cyclops card from your discard pile to your hand or place 2 power counters on Phoenix Force.

name: Marked
text:
Attach to an minion. Max 1 per minion.
Attacks against attached minion gain overkill.

name: Befuddle
text: Attach to an minion. Max 1 per minion. Interrupt: When a character makes a basic attack against attached minion, that character uses THW instead of their ATK.

name: Pinned Down
text:
Attach to an minion. Max 1 per minion.
Attached minion gets -2 ATK.

name: Honorary X-Men
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait.
Attach to a friendly character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[X-MEN]] trait.
